name: UIKeyCommand
desc: An object that specifies a key press perform on a hardware keyboard and the resulting action.

items.name: init(title: String, image: UIImage?, action: Selector, input: String, modifierFlags: UIKeyModifierFlags, propertyList: Any?, alternates: [UICommandAlternate], discoverabilityTitle: String?, attributes: UIMenuElement.Attributes, state: UIMenuElement.State)
items.desc: Creates a key command that you can use as a menu element with a shortcut key, or a shortcut key only for a view controller.

items.name: init(input: String, modifierFlags: UIKeyModifierFlags, action: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a new key command object that matches the specified input.

items.name: var input: String?
items.desc: The string of characters corresponding to the keys that must be pressed to match this key command.

items.name: var modifierFlags: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The bit mask of modifier flags that must be pressed to match this key command.

items.name: struct UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: Constants that indicate which modifier keys are pressed.

items.name: var discoverabilityTitle: String?
items.desc: An elaborated title that explains the purpose of the key command.

items.name: var attributes: UIMenuElement.Attributes
items.desc: The attributes indicating the style of the key command.

items.name: var state: UIMenuElement.State
items.desc: The state of the key command.

items.name: var alternates: [UICommandAlternate]
items.desc: An array of alternative actions to take for the key command.

items.name: class UICommandAlternate
items.desc: An object representing an alternative action for a command.

items.name: var allowsAutomaticLocalization: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the system automatically remaps keyboard shortcuts based on the keyboard layout.

items.name: var allowsAutomaticMirroring: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the system automatically swaps input strings for some keyboard shortcuts when the interface direction changes.

items.name: var wantsPriorityOverSystemBehavior: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the key command takes precedence over text input or focus movements.

items.name: var propertyList: Any?
items.desc: An object that contains data to associate with the key command.

items.name: let UICommandTagShare: String
items.desc: A value that identifies a command as a Share menu.
